snippet: Federal prosecutors say that Rajat K. Gupta, a former director at Goldman Sachs and Procter & Gamble, tipped Raj Rajaratnam about Procter & Gamble's sales forecasts in late 2008.
abstract: Federal prosecutors say that Rajat K. Gupta, a former director at Goldman Sachs and Procter & Gamble, tipped Raj Rajaratnam about Procter & Gamble's sales forecasts in late 2008.

headline.main: Ex-Goldman Director Faces New Insider Trading Claim
headline.print_headline: Ex-Goldman Director in New Insider Trading Claim
